name: French Canadian Tourtière (Meat Pie)

ingredients.name: each lean ground beef, lean ground pork, and ground veal

preparation: Beat egg with milk. Set aside.
Cook meats in a large pan over medium heat until no longer pink inside. Drain excess fat.
Sprinkle flour and Epicure seasonings over meat, stirring well.
Combine beef broth and water. Add slowly and stir. Simmer until most of liquid has evaporated. Add potatoes, Sea Salt, and Black Pepper.
Remove from heat. Cool to room temperature or refrigerate.
Place chilled filling into prepared bottom pastry shell. Brush edges with egg and milk mixture and top with second pastry. Crimp edges and poke steam holes in top.
Bake 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 350° F (175° C). Continue baking for 20 minutes.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: An all-purpose blend with mild heat & aromatic flavour.
